ygData.subject: Books
ygData.msgSnippet: So far I ve bought all of the wizard series of research books and translated them.  I only counted about 25 or so spells in them.  All of them are in Old
ygData.messageBody:
So far I've bought all of the wizard series of research books and translated them. I only counted about 25 or so spells in them. All of them are in Old Erudian.

I know there has to be more, I have a rune right now that doesn't seem to go with any of the spells lists I've been given. Plus according to the book, On Languages, there are books writen in Combine, Dragon and Elder Dragon.

Anyone know where to find these?

Thanks,
Fastus
Level 21 Wizard
The Rathe
